text: Dray M (2022). tamRgo: Digital Pets R. https://matt-dray.github.io/tamRgo/, https://github.com/matt-dray/tamRgo.
code: @Manual{,   title = {tamRgo: Digital Pets in R},   author = {Matt Dray},   year = {2022},   note = {https://matt-dray.github.io/tamRgo/, https://github.com/matt-dray/tamRgo}, }

title: Digital Pets in R
text: Tamago (egg) + uotchi (‘watch’) = Tamagotchi. Tamago + R = {tamRgo}. work--progress R package lets interact R console little digital pet lives computer.

title: Digital Pets in R
text: Install {tamRgo} GitHub. package currently dependency free, need R version 4 higher. Instructions appear load package.
code: install.packages("remotes")  # if not yet installed remotes::install_github("matt-dray/tamRgo") library(tamRgo) # Welcome to {tamRgo}, a digital pet in the R console! #   - Docs at <https://matt-dray.github.io/tamRgo> #   - Create a new pet: lay_egg() #   - Get pet stats: see_stats() #   - Interact: play(), feed(), clean() #   - Say goodbye: release_pet() #   - Your pet continues to exist after your session ends

title: Digital Pets in R
text: Much package’s functionality yet developed. can expect code change great deal. See GitHub issues upcoming functionality. must first request egg laid. stores persistent blueprint pet computer safekeeping. time can see latest statistics pet. values update time. example, longer wait interact pet, higher ‘hunger’ status value get. pet also accumulate experience points (XP) contribute towards levelling visual transformations. can view console image (currently placeholder) pet time. appearance depend species. can play(), feed() clean() change pet’s status values. can release pet feel time right. delete blueprint computer. Fare thee well, sweet KEVIN.
code: lay_egg("KEVIN") # Save pet blueprint? y/n: y # Saved pet blueprint. # You have a new egg... it hatched! # See its stats with see_stats() see_stats() # Characteristics #   - Name:    KEVIN #   - Species: Z #   - Born:    2022-09-20 #   - Age:     0 # Experience #   - Level:   1 #   - XP:      0 # Status #   - Happy:   0/5 #   - Hungry:  0/5 #   - Dirty:   0/5 see_pet() ░░░░ ░░░░ ░░██ ░░██ play() # 'Happy' status value is now 1/5 release_pet() # Really release KEVIN? y/n: y # Are you sure? y/n: y # KEVIN was set free!

title: Digital Pets in R
text: package’s main mechanism persistent storage ‘blueprint’—RDS file containing list pet-related values—saved path resolved tools::R_user_dir("tamRgo", = "data"). values blueprint updated player interacts pet, given time ’s elapsed since last interaction. gives appearance pet lives ‘real time’.

title: Clean Your Pet — clean
text: Reduces 'dirty' status value 0.

title: Clean Your Pet — clean
text: Nothing.

title: Feed Your Pet — feed
text: Reduce 'hungry' status value 1 (min 0).

title: Feed Your Pet — feed
text: Nothing.

title: Print Your Pet's Stats — get_stats
text: Print console characteristics, experience status current pet.

title: Print Your Pet's Stats — get_stats
text: Nothing.

title: Print Your Pet's Stats — get_stats
text: output show following elements blueprint: Section 'characteristics': name Pet's user-provided name. species Randomly-selected pet species. born Date pet created. age Days since born. level Growth stage. xp Experience points. happy Happiness scale 0 5. hungry Hunger scale 0 5. dirty Dirtiness scale 0 5.

title: Create a New Pet — lay_egg
text: Generate save new pet's blueprint. pet begins life egg.

title: Create a New Pet — lay_egg
text: pet_name Character. name new tamRgo pet. Maximum eight characters.

title: Create a New Pet — lay_egg
text: Nothing.

title: Play with Your Pet — play
text: Increase 'happy' status value 1 (max 5).

title: Play with Your Pet — play
text: Nothing.

title: Release Your Pet — release
text: Delete current blueprint.

title: Release Your Pet — release
text: Nothing.

title: See Your Pet — see_pet
text: Print console image pet.

title: See Your Pet — see_pet
text: Nothing.

title: tamRgo: Digital Pets in R — tamRgo-package
text: Maintainer: Matt Dray mwdray@gmail.com contributors: Adriana De Palma [contributor]

title: tamRgo 0.0.0.9003
text: Added placeholder ‘graphics’ methods call (.e. .get_pet_matrix()) print (.e. .draw_pet()), wrapped exported function see_pet() (towards #10). Added simple system levelling .update_xp() (towards #9, #24).

title: tamRgo 0.0.0.9002
text: Added play(), feed() clean() functions altering pet’s status values. Set Depends R (>= 4.0).

title: tamRgo 0.0.0.9001
text: Shifted focus fully local experience (#20). Added internal functions .create_, .write_, .read_ .update_blueprint()s. Introduced time-dependent blueprint updates (toward #9). Added exported functions lay_egg(), see_stats() release_pet(). Added startup message (#6). Updated README DESCRIPTION. Added NEWS file track changes.

title: tamRgo 0.0.0.9000
text: Set package, README, license, sample data, {pkgdown} website, low-level user-facing functions. Developed first attempt function architecture, leant heavily GitHub gists storing pet blueprints remotely.
